column4: going to be 23 soon. Looking forward to getting to know people on here
column5: even though the feeling is likely not mutual. No one wants to know another depressed worthless 20-something.@@1

column1: 100@@ I have already decided I am going to kill myself. It is really just a matter of getting things in order. i cannot live this way any longer. My disorders have taken everything away from me. Doctors keep putting me off. There are no answers. Everything keeps coming back normal. Nothing helps. New medical problems year after year after year. Why should I live just to give others peace of mind....I don't see my family...don't care to. Why live so others can feel good about the fact that I ""live."" This is not living. I live in a prison every single day of my life. No joy...no nothing....do not shower
column2: do laundry
column3: do anything...I am non-functional. Why should I have to carry out my life just so others can feel better. Things have not gotten better. It has been about 20 years of hell...I am 35. There is no hope and I REFUSE to ""live"" this way. I am so done.@@1

column7: and my problem permanent. I've posted my story when I first registered. Here's a link to the post: . Except that now I'll be 24 in less than two weeks. In less than two weeks

column9: and I'm still struggling to know what is wrong with me. In that post I've explained about my situation
column10: and how it's all not by choice. It simply makes me lose my mind. I'm literally losing my mind
column11: and then they tell me it's temporary. No
column12: no it isn't. I've been this way ever since I started wanting a girlfriend. It's not at all temporary. No person can still be sane after being forced to be alone forever. It's even negatively affecting every other aspect of my life. I have no motivation to do anything anymore
column13: including trying to pursue a partner. Part of it is the fact that I know I'll fail at it. Women don't realize what I want from them
column14: and I end up getting rejected (I've elaborated my problem in the linked post). I highly doubt you've ever heard of someone my age who doesn't have romantic experience and not by choice. I mean some people choose to be this way
column15: but this is not the case with me. This is something I very much want
column16: yet no girl has ever wanted me
column17: and I'm confident no girl ever will. I seriously spend almost my entire day thinking about this and getting depressed about it and at times so angry that I break stuff.@@3

column1: 104@@ I don;t really know why i am bothering to post this. I feel like I am becoming reclusive in my life. I feel like another every single day. A nuisance. Something very unnecessary to life. A sack of meat. What a sick way to think.... I do not understand my thoughts lately. I think constantly of ending my own life. I do not want to wake up tomorrow. I do not want to fight anymore. I don't want to force myself to live. All I really want is a little love and affection I think. I do not have that. The friends I did have have moved on in their lives. To more serious
column2: solidified parts. They spend a lot of time with boyfriends
column3: which is fine and I understand or try to
column4: but no longer do we talk every day or even every other day. No longer when I call and tell them I am down do they try to make me see reason when I can't find it alone. My family does not believe mental illness exists. Sometimes due to this I think i am simply unstable and crazy. I lost my very best friend. He was my husband and he left out of the blue one day. I still miss him. This was well over  year and a half ago. But he is not the cause of my hopelessness. I do not always feel iike there is a reason
column5: It scares me. Because I can be very happy in life and very uncomfortable at the same time. I feel like I do not deceive happiness. I experienced some abuse growing up- mostly verbal
column6: some sexual. I used to cut and I was in psych ward for a bit. I do not understand anything anymore. I don't want to wake up tomorrow but I know I will because I will make myself. There is part of me that is terrified of going to Hell from committing suicide. And there is also a part of me that feels like I deserve Hell. I don;t know why. I don't know why I hate myself so much except that I feel like a bother. I feel like an inconvenience  to everyone around me. I feel like no one would notice I was gone if I was to die. No one would care. What terrifies me is here lately I have been unable to drag myself out of these thought processes. I have not have the mental strength to pull myself out and say hey girl there is more to life than you think You are more valuable than you think. I can;t find that value anymore. I look in the mirror and I just see sadness. I don't know why I am sad. I can;t give a specific reason and I am so tired of people asking for reasons. I feel like I am lying all the time when I say I am sad for this reason or that reason. It does't feel like the entire truth.Yes it makes me sad but I was sad before then. I have been sad since I was a little girl. I remember wanting to commit suicide at age nine. I hated myself so very much and I still do. I don't know how to love myself anymore. I don't know how to find value. I had planned for the past couple of months now to kill myself tonight. I have been sitting here thinking about it. I have cried and cried at the idea of ending my own life. I have felt confused and conflicted
column7: angry. I don't want to die but I am so very tired of waking up every morning feeling this fog
column8: this burden of sorrow. I am of faking the biggest grin. I am probably one of the most ""cheerful"" people I have ever met
column9: but it is all a lie. I don't even know how to admit the truth in my reality anymore. I guess that is why I turned to the internet. To speak my mind and my fear. My confusion. I just want to crawl into a hole and disappear. I do not wan tot exist anymore. I find no value in who I am. I don;t even know where to begin. I just thought I would finally tell someone. I feel like every day I am trapped inside my own head. I do everything for everyone. I volunteer. I give up my own possessions so someone can have what I have
column10: enjoy it
column11: love it. I like to bring others joy because I know what it is like to be absent of joy. I am so absent lately. I do not know what to do anymore. Everyone I ask for help turns away. They don't know how severe it is. How scary. I am too afraid to tell. Too afraid they will completely abandon me.@@2

I want to know I am still a good person even if I make mistakes. I'm so scared of making mistakes in life. Even one hurtful comment hurts me a lot. My prof said 10 mean things to me. My system is in shock. To normal people

column1: 115@@ My name is Bryan. I have this condition called 46 xx male and it is a rare 1 out of 20000 birth defect and I have it. It is the most awful thing in the world. I fell into severe depression and anxiety and completely lost the will to live throughout my teens and early adulthood and had no idea what was wrong with me. I was not even told I had this problem or got help till my I got engaged and my mom was shaking when she told me afraid I would hate her for it. To make things worse I have a verbally abusive father who makes fun of my birth defect and makes me sound like a junkie for needing Testosterone shots every week. He lies straight to my face
column2: mistreats me
column3: and my siblings and make me feel like worthless crap. I feel so alone and sad. I don't feel normal. I don't feel like God wanted me to be happy and cursed me to never have a family of my very own or to even get married and have love for the rest of my life which is the only thing I want and care about in life. My parents tried TRT only once when I was 8 years old and the doctor was not authorized to give me that and should be in JAIL because he was giving me a dose of 1000mg for an 8 year old which is the equivalent to that of a full grown body building man and I could of had a heart attack or stroke. I went through an array of forced growth spurts which had me in agony crying on the floor for the next month or so and I remember crying to go to the doctor and my mother said she would take me but than she said I didn't need to go after calling my doctor finding out it was the testosterone. During that time my brain chemistry got completely screwed up and I had very strong sexual thoughts for those few months and I was only 8!!! I had a forced puberty and had a beard at the age of 9  which disappeared a year or so later and my puberty slowed to a halt. I got supper aggressive and snappy and was always in pain. It scared the crap out of my parents and took me off which during the next 6 months to a year my body had to go through a complete withdrawal which damaged me further at a young age. around 12-14 the depression and anxiety began to take over my life and I couldn't even sit in a classroom and had to run to the bathroom with my heart fluttering and tears running down my cheeks.  I didn't feel right around boys or girls and barely had friends and I didn't even know I had it at the time. I was only told at the age of 21. During my teen years  I fell behind in school and so did my grades. I saw no interest in life and hated every moment I breathed. I completely lost the will to live. I went to a christian high school here on Marco Island in Florida called WCA for one year where my depression was just getting worse and worse along with the anxiety. I got a chest infection and that put me in the hospital for a few months because I have terrible Asthma and  I had to be put on a machine and medication which I had a similar occurrence in middle school in 8th grade. My life just worse and worse. The credits I earned at WCA weren't valid and I was taken into home school where I fell further behind and pretty much was giving up. I hated everything
column4: wanted everything to end
column5: had very little to no friends
column6: and had no will to even do the things I loved. I was developing incorrectly and I began shaking and crying throughout the day just at home. I would hide in my room and hurt myself blaming all my families problems on myself. I couldn't function. I just shook and cried and prayed for help. I don't know why but I just couldn't stop shaking and crying. I would break out in tears in front of my mom telling her I wanted to die
column7: that I don't know what is wrong with me but I can't stop feeling sad and worthless. I couldn't even go out to eat without needing to escape to the restroom to be alone. When I was young in elementary school I was black mailed and repetitively raped by and older man maybe in his thirties at school which just added to my depression and feeling of worthlessness and made me feel like I didn't deserve love or a family of my own. At the age of 21 which is my current age which I turned around Sep 20th I was told in Nov about my problem and finally went to doctors and began TRT with Androgel around December. I was extremely disappointed as it wasn't working and it was now January at the time. Around month 5 I began to have a bit more confidante and have a more of ""I don't care I'll risk it attitude. I go to the gym regularly and lift which is more of a therapy for me than it is exercise as it helps relax me and focus on one thing other than pain. I still feel worthless and depressed. I finally finished high school in July of this year 2015 through Penn Foster with a GPA of 3.7 which could of been a lot better. I'm working on getting a car and better job as at the moment I'm working for my father and its unbearable as I am mistreated
column8: lied too and underpaid.  I feel awful and like a failure in life and I couldn't control my life events. People look at me like I'm a loser for finishing school so late. They act like I'm some sort of incapable worthless waist of life and I am not. I would do anything to be independent and on my own as I hate where I live. My mother died in Feb which mate things worse. She died in her sleep at a hospital. She had sleep apnea undiagnosed and fell asleep losing oxygen to her brain which cause a heart attack and comma. column1: 158@@ Hi everybody
column2: Basically as my title states
column3: my life is hell. I'll try not to go on and on here but basically it's been like this for many many years. Growing up I was always bullied at school and made to feel bad and stupid by all the teachers who literally told me almost every day that I would never amount to anything. I started becoming depressed and didn't know where to turn. My parents were constantly on my back about why I was such a bad child and why I was constantly disappointing them. This went on for the whole 7 years of both high school and college (primary school was bad too but not as bad as these) and I turned to suicide. When my parents found out one day instead of compassion I got the ""why are you doing this to us?"" Anyway time went on and I went to culinary school (wanted to be a chef) but these two girls in my class decided for some reason that they didn't like me and would make the class and my life hell and they did. I found myself skipping classes and I turned to suicide yet again. During all this time my home life was anything but happy. My mother and I have never gotten along and she would tell me every opportunity she got that I was a selfish c*w and not the daughter she wanted. She even threatened to call the cops on me once. And my parents were extremely over protective even up till now (I'm 30). I wanted to move out when I was 18 and my father said if I dared pack my bags I would be cut out of the family. They would make me text (in my early 20's) every two hours where I was and what I was doing. Then anything I wanted to do it was usually a no. I was 23 and I bought tickets to go to another state and see a musician I liked and they basically forbid me to go. So I lost my money because I couldn't refund the flights and everything. I was with a guy one night and my father found out and called every person in the phone book with his surname until he found his parents and asked them to call him to tell me to call home. I was so embarrassed and of course was made to come home. This was at 26. When I went to officially quit the class the lady at reception told me that I had a nice personality and had I thought of front of house? Well next thing I know I enrolled in a Hotel School and I am off again in the hopes of getting my life going in the right direction. I fell in love with the course and front of house completely and finally felt that I had found my calling. I graduated the course and got my first job working in a hotel in Banquets. Within a couple of years I was promoted to being team leader but things were far from great. My first boss hated me and literally told me so and she once even grabbed me by the scruff of the neck
column4: my second boss actually seemed okay but he didn't last long so next boss hit on me and when I refused him he decided from then on that he was going to make my life there... yep hell. When he moved up a position he told the new Banquet manager that I was one to watch out for and shouldn't be trusted. He even threatened me. He then told our new Food and Beverage manager and he took a sudden disliking to me to. I then got demoted due to somebody lying and saying I didn't something wrong when it was them who did it and not me. I then had to earn my position back. Soon after we got an assistant manager who tried to....force himself on me. Then pretty much it just kept going bad from there. Whilst working there I ran into an old teacher from my school who said in front of my boss that she couldn't believe that I had actually gotten a job. I felt like running away and hiding. In then end I found the boss was telling lies about me and trying to get me to break.. to snap. I was getting letters of praise from past clients and guests but I found out he was throwing them in the bin. I went to see Human Resources about my issues and then I found out that straight after our meeting he told my boss everything I had said to him and that he should ""watch out"" for me. Eventually I couldn't take it anymore and I left. I didn't get a chance to get another job because my mother was soon diagnosed with parkinsons and I had to stay home and help. This went on for 5 years with me eventually losing contact with friends and the outside world due to the fact that my mother needs full time care and she can't leave the house. Then my father got cancer and now I am the carer for both my parents. So I have been house bound for 6 years now with hardly any contact with the outside world. I have a brother who is older than me. He lives in a different country to me and he has a fancy job with a fancy pay. When he is down he tells me how screwed I am and that I have to stop being a burden to the family. I have also had (in the past) a lot of mentally and emotionally abusive relationships. Right now I see a lot of changes in my health that is freaking me out. I know some can be due to stress but its got me very scared.  I spend most of my time crying
column5: shaking and in complete panic of my situation and my life. I haven't had a job in 6 years and the only money I get is the payouts from the government for caring for my parents which they made me jump through hoops for. It was not easy. I'm scared
column6: I'm alone and the thoughts of suicide are coming back because once again
column7: I feel I have no option.@@4

column1: 186@@ I'm not sure why I signed up here or what I hope to gain but I have an overwhelming need to get this out if only to the anonymous users of this site. column2: attractive
column3: intelligent and well liked. Although it exhausts me to do so
column4: I am very personable in social settings and can speak to most anyone about most any subject. I have tried to open up to others about my depression only to have them believe I am joking as they believe I have everything going for so how can that be possible? I've gone to therapy and have tried a multitude of anti-depressants with varying degrees of failure. The entire process of trying one after another looking for relief depressed me even more and I stopped taking them altogether. Even in therapy I never opened up about many thoughts of suicide due to being embarrassed and ashamed. I don't know how or if I would even go through with it but I've contemplated it countless times. I've gone so far as writing letters to those I love attempting to explain how I felt I just couldn't face another day. As of yet I've never actually attempted anything but as I'm now a man in his 40's I truly wonder how much longer I can continue down this path. Life is not a journey for me
column5: it's an obstacle. No matter how many successes I have in my life I am simply numb. There is little to nothing that I look forward to and the only relief I have is sleep. column6: I only wanted to at least tell someone how I'm feeling. It's 6:00 pm and I'm staring at the clock in hopes it speeds up so that I can finally go to sleep and end yet another worthless day...all knowing that there's another right around the corner.@@4

211@@ Life for me feels just like an endless cycle of disappointment and sadness that feels like each cycle acts as quicksand pulling me deeper into despair and depression that seems impossible to get out of. Each time there is a glimmer of hope life seems to halt it and seems to shout ""f you for trying."" This has happened year after year. I have posted about my many medical issues that ""don't worry they are not fatal."" No cure type things that have deteriorated my quality of life on top of the depression I already have. I have organic depression along with medically related depression. Therapy and medications have not worked and I have had years of putting in the effort. I have no family now. I used to talk with my mother everyday however I hold so many resentments from my family that I have taken myself out of it. So I am alone. All of my dreams are extinguished within the last decade because I have spent all my time feeling hopeless in doctor's offices locally and throughout the country. I was unemployed over a year due to the stress of everything. That was NOT me. That is not who I am as a person but my job was too much given the constant pain I am in. I hate the fact that I did not choose these things. i did not choose to be born. I don't want this and I can't take this anymore. No amount of medications
column2: psychotropic that is

column1: 262@@ My depression first started back when I was about 11 years old

column6: that I would just have to deal with them as they came. When I hit high school that's when my depression hit me with full force

column1: 264@@ A little while ago I struggled with severe depression and thoughts of suicide.  Had planned out a fool proof way so I wouldn't fail and end up severely crippled.  Came close many times.  Dad had died
column2: dog I had since I was a teen who was one of my two best friends in the whole world passed away
column3: wife who was my other best friend divorced me unexpectantly and a series of other things went seriously wrong. My best friend drifted away and I had no other close friends left.  Only thing that stopped me each time was I still had a very good although stressful job that paid extremely.  Thought at least that's something which I could also use to get some help and try again to make a last attempt to turn my life around.  Then I got laid off unexpectantly (never lost a job in my life before) with a deep recession and no other jobs available in my area. Now I am also unemployed
column4: have no money and might lose my house on top of everything else that I was depressed about.  Prior to the job loss I would have been positive that this would have pushed me over.  Some how I'm still here.  I came to an important realization though.  No matter how bad things seem they can always get much worse.  Best to enjoy what you have now.  For about 5 years things in my life kept getting worse and I always kept looking back thinking how good I had it five years ago
column5: two years ago
column6: one year and even six months in the past.  Thinking what I wouldn't give to go back to where I was back then when at the time I was also depressed and also thinking what I wouldn't give to go back to better times. For some reason now and recently whether it be that I am in the eye of the storm or that thought that I had better savour today because it can always get much worse tommorow I feel calm and ok.  Part of me thinks so what if everything I cared about is now gone.  Life is a journey and the past was just one part of the experience with the future being another chapter in the journey of life to get to experience. I really hope that this is not just the eye of the storm.@@5

I ended up meeting a girl in band who had the same interests as me and who I found to be very beautiful. I became her friend and became incredibly attracted to her and at one point even thought I was in love with her. I decided to remain her friend as she had a boyfriend at the time
column5: even though she already knew how I felt about her. After she broke up with him I waited a for a bit and decided to ask her to do go out with me. Every time I attempted to ask she made every excuse possible
column6: telling me she was busy or too tired from the long week. On one occasion she told me she couldn't do anything with me because another male friend of hers had invited her to do something. She began becoming crueler toward me and was frustrated with me for ""asking to many questions"" such as how her day was or details about a trip she recently took. She explained to me that she wanted time to be alone from everyone and pull herself together
column7: and that she was rejecting my offers because did not want to be in a relationship. I decided to give her the benefit of the doubt but about 30 days later I found out from another person that she began dating someone else. When I confronted her about it she explained that she had ""fallen in love"" and couldn't control her emotions. She said she was sorry about this and that she would not be talking to me as often and that she could take care of herself. I felt terrible over this and this year when I attempted to contact her she came off as completely disinterested in my existence. She told me she stopped talking to me because she didn't want to hurt me. The last time I saw her in person in waved to her she did not even acknowledge me directly
column8: but simply looked at me with an awkward half smile. I guess all the time she told me she cared about me were lies. The type of obviously fake smile that said I shouldn't even bother trying. I feel foolish being so torn over what to many sounds like a silly high school crush
column9: but she is the only girl who ever engaged or showed any interest in me as a human being. Every time she passes me in the hallway i feel sick to the stomach. Now in my senior year I am fearful of my future
column10: feel extremely lonely
column11: and feel like I have no sense of identity or belonging. On top of that I have developed a strange condition where I am extremely photosensitive and see afterimages of anything that emits or reflects light
column12: or is even remotely light colored. This is accompanied with a pressure in my head and an extreme lethargy. I have no idea if its a neurological disorder or an optical one or if its a recent symptom of the tourretes I've had all my life. column13: whether it be reading or gaming or simply enjoying a good show. I feel completely alone and have trouble even willing myself out of bed in the morning. column1: 330@@ I suppose you can say that I've had a history of depression and ""attempts."" I put it in quotes because looking back at it
column2: while I had the sincere desire to stop living I think those attempts were for attention. An SOS to anyone that could save me from the awful pain of wanting to live but wanting to die...if that makes sense. Something has shifted though. For the last few years I haven't been what I identify as depressed. I was neither happy nor sad which I'm sure you know is a relief from the low parts of depression. I decided that I would just serve my time here like everyone else and fill it up with ish I could care less about. I started on a...spiritual/mindfulness sort of course last September. In January I started crying during my lunch breaks for over a month. It wasn't the familiar dark of the darkness that was producing this within me. It was something else. All of a sudden I realized without a shadow of a doubt that everything in this world is a big fat nothing. There is no happy endings. No knight in shining armor. There is no permanence in this world and everything! everything constantly changes...even love. I was not depressed. I know depression as it was my beloved for a very long time. I only know that I looked at the trees and the grass and the people and the nice houses...and none of it mattered. I am miserable. I'm trying so hard not to be but every time I look in the face of the horrible entity they call suicide...I am comforted. I feel peace. I am never happier than when I think about this insufferable pain being over with. The pain that life isn't beautiful...not to me and that it hasn't gotten any better. The pain of being on a 'loveless' planet where the rules constantly change...I failed at conforming. I cannot adapt. I have 2 kids. I should feel guilty? I don't. I feel it would be for the greater good because who I am and who I have been to them is nothing but a puppet. I have no more cares in me. I can't even pretend it anymore. After a crying spell today (as today is suppose to be my 13th wedding anniversary) it hit me--I can't do this anymore. I'm tired. Tired of trying to find ways to hurt myself (which has been emotionally and psychologically these last few years) just so that I can feel something--anything! The pain of not feeling anything but despair and loneliness and inadequacy is just too much. And it's all for naught because it (life) will never get better. I hate it here. I hate all of it and would gladly trade it in for the unknown if it means peace. Rest. For months I have been contemplating but not in the usual way. Not in the innocent poor sad girl who just needs love way. It's been in a philosophical sort of way. I held on because they said it gets better. They said if I held on and did the work and joined society and show vulnerability
column3: it'd get better. I was holding on in hopes that it was true. I was holding on to the world and the value that I attached to it: that it all has to mean something. I came to this board by accident because I was looking for something else but I'm glad I came upon it because it means I'm not alone in that sense. Haven't cornered the market in inexplicable pain...:) Sorry it was so long. Thanks for reading and for sharing on this board.@@3

338@@ Those who have some good days are lucky.  Mine are just bad.  I am one of those people who wake up every morning and wish I hadn't.  Why couldn't I have just passed out of existence while I slept rather than face another day of nothinginess
column2: of existence not living? I have been living with depression
column3: and anxiety for 40 years.  I am 60-years old. I have no joy
column4: no interest in doing anything I used to. Suicide ideation just pops into my head at the strangest times.  I went out to my car to take out the CD's so I could listen to my music in my house and the thought just popped into my head.  Where did that come from?   I wasn't thinking about dying or even wanting to die the idea was suddenly in my mind. I like to be in control and depression and anxiety have taken my ability to control my emotions and thoughts away from me. For years I did control my life
column5: I wore a mask and just told everybody I was ""just fine.""  They were awestruck to find out I suffered from major depressive disorder. I agree with those who say that the more intelligent or more educated tend to suffer more from depression yet I don't know if that statement is supported by research or not.  Those of us who think a lot
column6: we do the whole existential thing tend to question the value of life more than those who don't spend time mulling over such weighty issues. My therapist tells me to get out of my head and ""think"" with my heart.  The problem is my heart died years ago.  I have no positive emotions
column7: no feelings of love.  I had hoped that when my grandson was born I would be able to hold a newborn baby and feel the love.  I felt nothing.  How sad is that to not feel love for a child? I also agree with those who say you should not have children if you suffer from depression.  Unfortunately I didn't know about the devastation and utter despair of depression before I had my kids otherwise I never would have passed on my genetic structure to my kids.  Both have suffered bouts of depression already and it kills me to see them suffer knowing I passed on the vulnerability to become depressed. You know the really ironic part of all this?  I have also inherited longevity.  My parents are both 92 years old and their folks lived to be 95
column9: and 98.  So I have the likelihood of living a very long life - and for what?  I don't contribute to society I just use up valuable natural resources that could be better used by other
column10: more productive people. Oh joy.  It is almost 5am and i have been unable to sleep most of the night so the rest of the day I will be worthless
column11: fatigued and unable to function - not that I do anything of value anyway. Thus endeth my whining.@@5

column1: 362@@ ever since I became aware that I have a nervous disorder my self esteem started to sink. as each day came and went and I became conscious of how much I was worrying all the time
column2: I started to feel unhappy with myself and that feeling has lasted throughout childhood right up to the present time. for example I had a conversation with a person who lives on the opposite side of the street for the first time and I was conscious that I was trembling. I could feel my head nodding as per normal and I kept thinking to myself I wonder if she notices that my head keeps nodding? I felt like telling her that I suffer with bad nerves but I decided to keep that private. I used to use cannabis and alcohol to help calm my nerves but when I think back to those days I know that I was kidding myself. I'm sure my head still nodded and my hands trembled all the time as normal. I also realize that throughout all those years I was crying out for help without actually saying a word. I was communicating by actions such as wearing two pairs of trousers because I was worried that my legs were too thin and I hated the flared trousers my parents would buy and force me to wear. I was also crying for help by bunking school instead of going to learn as much as possible. one way or another I was crying out for help and few people noticed. my parents knew that Something was wrong with me but they didn't know how to help me? its not surprising that years on I still feel unwell physically and mentally. in fact I feel even worse now. I feel evermore insecure and unhappy and I find it difficult to see a way out? therefore its natural that I think more and more about committing suicide. I don't want to do it but I feel that as long as I continue disliking my life and life in general I'll continue viewing death as something far better even though I know I'm kidding myself. I know all my hang ups and inner and outer problems will end but I won't be able to enjoy the feeling of being free because I'll be dead. after 48 years on my road I'm growing evermore tired of my life. I dislike it in so many ways. I find it difficult to see any value in my existence. like kirk cobaine sang in his song I also feel stupid and contagious and tired and fed up. if it wasn't for the fact that my mum is still alive I think I would go ahead and bring my life to a permanent end. because I can't see things improving. I feel so tired of life. going through the same routine day after day etc sometimes I wish I could be in an accident. I sometimes feel like being careless and hope it will bring my life to an end. but so far I decide not to go through with it only to end up feeling like I feel at present. does anyone else feel similar? I'm at the lowest point of my life. I think about suicide daily and don't really care if I wake up. I've lost everything and it was all my fault. I don't know why I keep going. The only real reason I guess is my kids. Everyday seems to get harder and harder though and it's incredibly hard to look at the world.  I see no beauty

column1: 380@@ I've been concerned with how I've been feeling for years but I've never discussed my feelings with anyone because I'm scared. Just writing this post is making me anxious and uncomfortable but I think it's a good first step to help deal with what's going on. This past week I've been feeling really suicidal. I'm actually surprised that I haven't done anything yet. My thoughts are beginning to scare me and I'm scared that I'm just going to give up trying. I've felt this way before but I've managed to work through it but this time feels different somehow. I don't really know how to seek help for what's going on and I feel like things are not going to improve any time soon. There's only so many times one can say things will improve and actually believe that it's going to happen. I've been tempted to go to the emergency room but I'm scared. Just thinking about it I can feel my anxiety levels rise and my heart pounding in my chest. I also have so many things coming up and so many things to do that I can't imagine what would happen if I would have to stay in the hospital for any length of time. I also don't know if I can actually muster the courage to tell someone that I'm not fine and I need help. I don't want to kill myself but I do and it's beginning to feel like more and more of a good idea every day. I'm feeling awful and so confused that I'm not sure what to do anymore. I'm a 21 year old female and I live in Canada. I don't really have anyone to talk to about this in real life so any advice would be extremely appreciated. Thank you!@@1

column1: 385@@ All my life I have been that worthless person that nobody could care less about. Just that second class loser that people don't even consider or desire. Honestly I'm not a bad person and I never did anything wrong. I don't deserve this at all. I don't want this. I know people here will laugh at me and mock me to make me feel worse but I don't care. I have nobody to turn to except the internet because I'm just some worthless person nobody wants. The fact is my existence does not matter to and benefit anyone. I think I have a lot of potential but I am very unlucky. I can no longer tolerate or have any energy left inside me to be that worthless loser that nobody cares about. I never asked for this. Never. I never did anything wrong. I never hurt anyone. For the first time in my life Suicide is actually becoming a REAL and SERIOUS option for me. What's the point if you will just be some inferior laughingstock and alone for the rest of your life?  I have no obligation to anyone for this life therefore I don't have to live as the worthless inferior loser. I don't choose that life. I never did. Never will. But what the fuck do I do??? How do I undo this nightmare? I don't want to live like this. I am the kind of person that nobody cares about. That nobody would ever actually choose to want or desire.  A successful person with self respect and a good life that is. I am the kind of person nobody ever thinks of or cares about. All my life I have never been loved or wanted by one person. Not one person. Never in my life has anyone actually ""wanted"" or ""chose"" to be with me or had any ""desire"" to be with me if that makes sense. Like I said I'm just that person nobody could care less whether dies or not. You can say that I am only 20 and still young but I feel like it's already to late. I feel like my personality has already been far too damaged enough to be a normal person. I feel like I have missed the train if that makes sense. Just a dumb analogy. People here can lie and say they care but it's not true. I have never had a girl I like or wanted actually ever have any interest in me or liked me. Never had sex even. I never even kissed a girl before. That's how sad and pathetic my life is. Go ahead and laugh and mock me all you want. I won't lie anymore. I have never been in love with a girl that loved me back. I have never had a true friend in my life. I have always been that powerless loser that just about anyone can take advantage of and discard at will. I don't care what anyone here says. The bottom line is: I want to be like this. I want to be a pathetic inferior loser anymore. I don't know how to change this. Is it hopeless after all? Am I doomed for a life alone? Am I doomed to be an inferior laughingstock for the rest of my life? Will I ever be normal? Hell look at normal peoples lives. Normal people have tons of relationships
column2: fall in love
column3: have real friends
column4: have people who actually care about and want them
column5: are not powerless like me
column6: Are good looking
column7: are free and happy (able to loudly express themselves and attract others) are traveling the world and happy whereas I am just some loser nobody knows or cares about. I'm so miserable. What should I do? How do I find people I actually want? How will a girl I like ever want a loser like me when there are so many better options? Help. Please Help@@4

column1: 404@@ Right now I'm crying all alone in my room. I don't think I'll sleep tonight. Too much pain and worry. I haven't slept normally for so long. I'm all alone in life. Recently something terrible happened to me which triggered all this but I don't want to discuss it as it'll only make me feel worse. I feel so hopeless at this point. Like my life is vanishing before my eyes. Like my entire life was nothing more than a lie. All I ever wanted was to just be wanted and cared for. To just be a normal person. I don't want to die but what if I go too far and actually kill myself? Who will care? Nobody. How sad is that? How sad is it that even if I killed myself no person would actually care. It would affect nobody. No person would actually need me or miss me. Why? Why does it have to be this way for me? I'm not a bad person. I never hurt anyone and this is how life is for me. I don't want to die alone but that is what is exactly going to happen to me at this rate. All I want is to just be normal like everybody else. To just have a girl who actually loves me and I love too. Someone I can spend the rest of my life with and friends who actually care about me. Not to be miserable in this fucking house all alone every day. Please anyone just please give me any advice on what to do. I've never been at a lower point in my life and I really need someone right now. Anyone. Please@@3

column1: 414@@ So what I'm going to write is probably going to be very long and hard to write but at this point I have nowhere to turn anymore. Nobody to talk to about this. Nobody who cares about me that can actually help me. This has been the worst time of my life that I can ever remember. Never in so long have I been this bad. I'm at one of the lowest points in my entire life and I feel so horrible every single day. Please don't say anything mean or bad. As it will only make me feel worse as it is. I need support. I need someone right now. So now I'm going to try to explain what has happened and what had brought me to this point.its going to be long and hard to write but I have to. I'm crying while I type all this. So basically I was extremely lucky to meet the most wonderful person I ever had the fortune of knowing. When we first met she was always there for me every day. :( the only person who would be there for me. The only person who ever truly cared about me. My best friend in the world. After I got my phone we started texting on it every day. I love her so much and she loved me too as a friend. I wouldn't trade her for the world. We were so happy together and I was so happy too. Yet disgustingly enough I took my life for granted. A mistake I will never repeat again. I would always help her when she needed me and she would always. Always be there for me. When my grandparents died and I was left alone she was the only person who cared about me and was there for me. She's not a bad person. Not at all. She tried to convince me many times that life is worth living when I was suicidal. Nobody has ever cared that much for me and I took it all for granted like a stupid piece of shit. So we talked to each other every day. Every morning she would be there and message me and every night she would tell me ""good night"" give me a hug and I would go to sleep happy and peacefully. If I didn't reply for even an hour she would get so worried. She would start to cry and panic because she was afraid something would happen to me. I was paranoid at times. I would question her almost every day and ask her if she really cared about me or not. I would say things like ""you don't really care about me do you?"" Or ""do you really even care about me?"" And EVERY time she had to reassure me that she DID care so much. It had gotten so bad that I would ask her over and over again almost every single day.  I know that she's a wonderful person so I'm trying to be fair. Eventually I started falling in love with her. She already had a boyfriend however long before we met and she was in a very happy relationship with him. She loved him so much and she wanted to marry him. Looking back on it I see how wrong it was of me to be doing this to her when she was already happily in love with someone else. It was immoral of me and I shouldn't have but let me continue my story. So eventually I did confess my love for her. She told me she couldn't because she was already devoted to someone and that she wishes she could but she wouldn't  be  able to return those feelings to me because she was already with someone. I let it go at the time but this would only get worse later on. At this point things were amazing. I was happy in life for the first time in years. I told her to promise me that she would always be my friend and to give me her word she would never leave me. She gave me her word and she told me she would never leave me and that I could trust her. I took that trust and I trusted her. At this point of my life things were never better. I had an amazing best friend that nobody in the world could ever replace. My self esteem was much better than it had ever been in years. And I was genuinely happy. But most of all I had an amazing supportive person who was there for me every day. Things were improving so much. I was looking forward to a great future and for the first time things were finally getting better and going right. Looking back on it that time with her was one of the most happiest moments of my life. I still remember so many special moments that we shared together that can never be replaced by anyone. If only I had acted differently at that time I would never be in this place today. Continuing with my story as time went on things started getting bad. I started getting jealous of her partner and would constantly ask her about being with me and even get angry. I started getting too personal with her and her relationship. It was then for the first time she actually considered leaving me. I was shocked. I couldn't believe it. How could she actually say that? How could she actually say she would leave me? ( This was only the FIRST time she contemplated leaving me. However this would continue many times in the future as I will mention). I had to beg her not to. Not because of being alone. No far from it. At that time I had many other friends and girls I talked to but NONE could ever come close to her or even match her. But because she was special to me. She was the most important person in my life and there really isn't anyone else on earth I would rather be with. She didn't leave but she warned me that if I did it again then she would leave. I promised I wouldn't. It was at this point I think that things really started going downhill. It was nowhere as near as bad as it would get later on. So we continued talking normally every day. As usual she would be there every morning and say good night to me every single night. I think about her every day. Somewhere around this time when I was having my usual paranoia I was questioning her if she really cared about me or not. It was this time she said ""you mean the world to me"". That really touched me because nobody had ever cared that much about me before. She told me I would always be important to her and countless times I asked her to promise me she will always be my friend for the rest of my life. She promised every time and said ""I'll always be your friend"" and she wasn't lying. She meant it. She never lied to me. Not once when we were together did she ever lie. At one point of time things were so good between us I thought to myself "" there is no way I'll ever lose her
column2: we care about each other way too much"". then my paranoia only got worse and my jealousy and anger as well. I would start to question her almost daily. Asked her if she really cared about me or not. She always  reassured me that she did care and she wasn't using me. I was paranoid and jealous. I kept asking her if she was talking to other people but she wasn't. I would get angry and call her names including ""Bitch"" She told me I was paranoid and needed to trust her. This viscous cycle went on for months and it only got worse. I really damaged her life badly because of it. Her grades in college were declining because of me
column3: it was damaging her health
column4: and I was only making her depression worse. She probably suffered so much because of me and I probably put her through so much pain. Yet she still remained with me despite all that because she cared about me so much. It only got worse later on. I would start to cuss at her and be abusive
column5: accusing almost every single day. She gave me many many warnings that this was becoming a toxic friendship for her and if I kept acting this way she would have to leave and many times she almost did leave but again I begged her not to leave and I made promises that I would change. She never left and always forgave me every time but I repeated the same stupid fucking mistakes again and again. Then one incident just made our friendship even worse. It was when I told her I loved her again and she got mad at me for it. She told me she would never see me that way and to stop feeling that way towards her because she has a partner. That was the day I called her something very offensive and I think it really hurt her a lot ever since and that's the day I think she wasn't sure she wanted to stay anymore. By some miracle she still stayed with me even though I called her all those very bad things. At this point things really started getting bad. I would get paranoid every single day and we were doing more arguing than anything else. I would be abusive to her every day and it wasn't looking good. So one night she replies to me and I read it but couldn't reply because I was sleepy. When I woke up I didn't get a response from her as I always do so I got angry with her. She told me I didn't reply so it wasn't her problem. This made me cuss at her again and start saying more offensive things to her. This was the day I think she just decided ""enough was enough"" and she couldn't handle the negative influence I had on her life anymore so she said to me: "" I don't want to be friends anymore
column6: it's just too much"" and blocked me for the first time ever. I was panicking and in shock I never actually took her seriously that she would actually leave me. I NEVER thought she would actually leave me but she did. I was warned many times but I didn't listen@@4

column1: 417@@ So I couldn't even tell my Mom ""Happy Mother's day"" because every year I always feel guilty about not being able to do enough for her. I suffer from a disability that prevents me from doing more elaborate things like taking her out to dinner or breakfast. I can't hold a job because of this disability. So I can't buy her anything. Every year it's the same thing. I just end up making her a card and she seems to appreciate it
column2: but it's just not enough to me. I always have to watch my other guy friends do much better stuff for their Moms. I couldn't tell her ""Happy Mother's day"" yesterday because just saying the words would remind me of why I can't do anything for her. Just saying it would make me feel suicidal and want to kill myself because I feel like I'm not a good enough son for her. I put the words inside of a card but I had to force myself to do that. I just feel ashamed. She does so much for me and I can't do as much for her. She's the main reason why I'm suicidal...because I feel like she deserves better and if I can't give her that as a son why should I live?@@4

column1: 421@@ A few years back I lost my job due to back problems
column2: I have spinal stenosis coupled with 2 bulging disks. It started slowly I found I was in pain when I had to stand or walk for more than few minutes
column3: but instead of taking time off of work to get it checked I simply reduced how much i stood or walked in order to keep working. This facilitated a nasty cycle where the less I did the more weight I gained
column4: the more weight I gained the more pain I was in so I did less. Eventually I could no longer perform the required tasks for the job and had to leave

column6: they were sure that i had heart problems

column1: 424@@ I apologize in advance for being so detailed. From the time I was 16
column2: I knew something was ""wrong"" with me. I would check out books from the library trying to diagnose myself. I wasn't depressed but I would go through periods of isolating
column3: to wanting to be with friends and having fun and laughing
column4: and then back to isolating and avoiding people. It confused a lot of people through the years
column5: and now everyone's sick of it and I have nobody (I'm not 39). I was lonely when I didn't spend time with friends

column7: very severe depression to the point I couldn't work and was barely functioning. Never suicidal until February 2009. I had my first inpatient experience in March 2011. Another in October that year. 2012 was bad. I went inpatient 8 times (one involuntary) plus a stint at a state institution. Altogether I spent approximately 67 days hospitalized that year. I was hospitalized twice in quick succession in Jan/Feb 2013. I have not been hospitalized since. I've had so many dx I don't know what to think. I believe it's Bipolar 2. GAD. ADHD (only dx given to me after an actual evaluation). I did have a period between Nov-March this year where I was behaving in what I would call a hypomanic state and I'm too embarrassed to go over the details. But I wasn't depressed so I didn't go to the hospital. Now I'm depressed. I don't know what happened. Back when I was being hospitalized a lot
column8: I lived alone. i had no responsibilities. I WAS alone. I was lonely. Now
column9: I take care of my 25 year old sister who has developmental issues
column10: as well as her 7 year old son. I don't do anything more than anyone would for a family member. I could be doing more. And usually I am fine with the responsibilities I have (we also have pets). The last week or so it's suddenly become suffocating
column11: I feel like I'm being crushed under the weight of this responsibility and I don't know why. Nothing changed. I've been doing this a year and a half. I feel like I can't take it and I want to leave then I think about the mess that would create for my sister and nephew (I raised my sister
column12: she's practically my daughter). And how I would feel so selfish
column13: knowing that because I'm weak I destroyed their lives. I don't want to be around to see it. if I can't do it
column14: I don't have a reason for living anyway. Everything seems magnified. Little things feel big. I feel so much anger and I don't know why. I just know it's taking a lot of reminding myself I don't want to die
column15: i just DONT WANT TO FEEL THIS WAY
column16: to keep me from a method that would be infallible. It would be so quick. I can't take care of myself and all these responsbilities. I finally found someone who said they'd come stay so I can go get help. I spent 3 hours putting together specific instructions on what needs to be done
column17: (rent is due this weekend)
column18: and I still feel like I'm failing them. And I wonder what will happen when I'm gone. i have a cat with severe asthma. What if he has a crisis? What if I forgot to put something in the instructions that's really important? I'm so selfish
column19: to leave. And that makes me feel even worse. I should be able to work through this without getting help in a hospital but I know I can't. I've been down this road before. I know where it leads. I started writing my goodbye letters. I started planning what to do with my stuff
column20: what to throw out

434@@ I've read that people can go to the emergency room if they're feeling particularly suicidal and thinking of hurting themselves. I'm just wondering when you would know it's time to do this. And how do you know it's not another time you might call a crisis hotline and feel better or just plain back out? I wouldn't want to put myself in a situation that's unnecessary but I also don't know what is necessary. I also find I can talk about suicide with friends without them believing I'll go through with it. None of my threats have ever been met with any serious response. It's almost frustrating... like I almost want them to see know how it would feel if I go through with it and they could have tried to do something to stop me. column1: 450@@ So I've had depression for a long time

column2: For over 30 years I've been doing this song and dance. I've been peeled like an onion by psychologists and psychiatrists alike. Addressed many things. Desensitized myself to the worst parts. Suicide is a common thought though I've desensitised to it and dismiss it with a thought. But it's a regular occurrence. I've come from using the thought as a whip to it becoming a habitual alternative thought to everything throughout the day. Yet here I am again. I'm only still here due to the efforts of friends and some family. Ironically I feel trapped because of it. Feeling trapped is not a healthy feeling. So I fight the urge to push everyone away. I've been labelled nearly everything under the sun at some point or another. But labels are shit and the Psychiatric profession from my many experiences is hit and miss
column3: largely a joke. I suffer from full blown MDD
column4: likely PTSD as well
column5: which repeats the cycle like clockwork once a year then every few years I get hit by a big one.  I think this is one of those. I spent 5 years medicated in the past. Whilst it helped some of the worst parts
column6: in the long run it did more harm. I become too sedated and it robs me of my core personality. I've loved and lost
column7: I've excelled in my career
column8: I'm generally liked by most of my peers
column9: I feel like I'm past the self pity. I just... don't care. I feel too fragile when things go wrong. Higher peaks seem harder to obtain when the crashing lows are so easily fallen into. column2: when I was done with work
column3: I just felt myself getting lower and lower. I had planned on going to a college baseball game after work. It took a lot for me to even get on the subway in the direction of the game. When I got to my final destination I was really tempted to hop on the next train back home. Somehow I kept walking. It's (normally) about a 20 minute walk from the subway station to the ballpark. I knew there was a convenience store on the way
column4: so I tried to bribe myself with junk food. Just get to the store
column5: I thought. Get some candy and a soda and see how you feel. I moved really slowly. Everything I looked at seemed to bring on bad feelings. It took a lot to keep myself moving forward. I got my junk food and it gave me some temporary relief. I decided to keep walking. Within minutes it became hard again. I was still moving very slow. Thankfully hardly anyone was around. I was just alone in a big open area on the college campus walking like an 80 year old with bad hips. It got harder to keep going. I was only about a 5 minute walk from the ballpark when I finally stopped. Among all the shitty thoughts I had
column6: I looked around the college and thought to myself ""I don't want to ever go back to college. I can't fucking do it."" Going back to school has always been a painful thought for me. That thought made me think of my social anxiety group
column7: and how I felt like I couldn't do that. I felt like I couldn't do anything to make things better. I badly wanted to sit down just for a minute. Just a few minutes from the ballpark I stopped and sat down. I really thought I was done. I thought ""this is it. This is my high water mark. This is as far as I can go to help myself. I just don't have it in me to keep going."" I wanted to go home
column8: but it crossed my mind that if I did go home
column9: I would just feel suicidal. I may even attempt it. I decided to get up and keep walking to the park. I finally got there. I sat alone for 3 innings before leaving. I just had no interest in the game. I didn't feel as low as I had earlier

column11: with a few pit stops for junk food. The suicidal thoughts haven't left. I fought back tears several times when walking around. When I got home I really lost it. I got close to calling the suicide hotline

column2: or at least how I truly feel. I think about suicide every day. My mom killed her self when I was ten years old and my father left me right when I was born. Everyone that knows me and knows my life has said they don't know anyone else who has had a harder life than me. I am 24 now and lived a life of constant drug abuse for ten years following my moms death. So when I was 20 I got sober and for a while life seemed to get better but this past year has just been the worst. I mean even though I am doing positive things with my life I feel like the time I spend thinking about suicide just keeps increasing. Some days I estimate I spend 4 plus hours a day thinking about it. It has become almost a fantasy and I imagine all the ways I could do it and think about every detail in the process. Its like a movie playing in my head on low volume all the time and I even imagine my suicide while listening to people talk and laughing and going about my normal day. If I were to look at my life on a written paper I wouldn't even believe a person could go on living like this. But something deep down inside me keeps me alive somehow. No matter how much time I spend contemplating suicide I have always known that I couldn't do it. I think this is partly because my mom did it and I saw how bad it hurt everyone around her and that is what stops me. Its like a deep down subconscious knowing that just KNOWS I am not going to do it and I have had it my whole life. Lately though I have noticed myself distancing myself from my close loved ones and I am starting to wonder if this means I might actually do it. Anyway I have these blocks that don't allow me to appear weak to people so no one really knows this is going on. I thought I wasn't ever going to tell anyone but then it hit me that I could just do it anonymously on a forum and maybe it might help. So here is my attempt to to express myself and see if it helps. Thanks for listening.@@3

column1: 598@@ I know the dictionary definition of suicide is taking your own life - right? But what about continually thinking about death and dying? Is it similar to suicide? My life has ""felt"" different ever since September of last year. I guess the catalyst for the change was a relapse in CFS/ME. This chronic condition has taken away some more ""living"" for me. Less energy
column2: less focus
column3: less ambition; more pain
column4: more fatigue
column5: more brain fog. It has impacted my work
column6: my social life (not that I was a big social butterfly before)
column7: and my marriage. So now it's been 6 1/2 months of living a less engaged or active life ... and I find myself thinking about death and dying a lot. At least every day. I am not making any plans
column8: I am not acquiring any means/methods
column9: I am not finishing up any loose ends
column10: and I am not actively working through any bucket list. But I have this strong sense of apathy - you know that inner ""meh"" you feel whenever you think
column11: I should do the laundry/call a friend/start a new painting/ or anything that speaks of vitality or interest or meaning. And today that apathy or pointlessness is really strong. It's as if I don't really care about being alive anymore. I feel bored and unmotivated ... I go through the paces
column12: go to work
column13: keep the house liveably clean

column13: editor of law journal

column1: 628@@ just really want to get this out. dont care who reads or sees it... the hate inside of me has been rising inside of me to a point where i cant really quell it anymore. hate for myself thing thats on my mind is my anger and rage towards women. it started with my mom and earlier this year it has been rising. i have no love for women. i want to but i hate females. i just cant deal with this obsession in my mind thats grown to outrageous levels. always looking and craving validation from women. fuck. its so annoying. i always think about it. with men i can interact without really caring but with women its different and its become so annoying. to always be thinking about what women think of me. blah blah blah. fuck. always caring about how they perceive me and if theyre attracted to me. i always need the attention on me and its become a curse. im a pretty good looking guy and have had my share of beautiful girls in my life -- its just become fuckin overwhelming to always be thinking about this. when there are myriad more important things than women to be thinking about i always care. im tired of caring. im tired of comparing myself to other guys and gauging why they might be more attractive than me. fuck its a curse. no mental peace with this shit. always from one thought to the next. and if i dont get that particular womans attention and compliments it eats away at me. its like i cant just have one or two girls giving me attention -- gotta have it all. it wasnt always like that either. it was after i started learning how to pick up girls with stupid bullshit books that lie and teach stupid shit that doesnt work -- it changed and transformed and deluded me into believing all these fallacies about myself and women. changed my nature. nothing was organic anymore.

AND its like i dont even feel any romantic feelings for women anymore. its just like -- if you're a woman then i want to try to get u into me and feeding my ego. or validating my brokenness. it fuckin sucks. then when i put myself out there and i DONT receive the validation it destroys me. beacuse i have been with really beautiful girls when i dont get that standard of woman i get enraged and deeply insulted. fuck. tired of being somebody im not. tired of putting on faces for people -- whether that be for women or other people or trying to mask my pain. or whatever the fuck just fuck it all. i need to die and im sick and tired of censoring my feelings and emotions for other people. ive went through more shit than most people combined in their whole lives. i know that. im so young too. so much trauma and one thing after another. no release and reprieve from the incessant pain... always drowning always suffocating. kills me. tired of feeling desperate for someone to save me or love me. part of me feels really ugly inside because of this condition and all the shitstorm of emotions that have flooded me because of this shit. i feel unlovable inside. i cant receive or feel love. i dont feel it. at all. its all just a face. i feel nothing but rage and hate. nothing but hopeless and despair and depression. just darkness of the darkest night. no moon no stars no light. i want to die. i want to stop this torment. fuck wt. women treat men better and stop being shit bags. i hate feeling unattractive when i know i am. i hate feeling insecure and weird and creepy when i know im not. and i used to gfeel like the cool guy who got his girl that he wanted. fuck its annoying. to not feel in control of your life and your mind and feelings. not knowing how to control anything its so defeating. my life is in shambles and im at wits end with how to keep going. im angry at myself and the drugs and david and albert and so many fuckin people for leading me to the point i am at in my life. so many people that slowly destroyed my life one tiny decision at a time. im nothing like i once was. ive hurt so many people. it weighs on me. yet i feel so numb cuz of the anger and hate. does anybody truly love me? i definitely dont feel it....is it possible to love me? theres a woman in my life who claims to love me. i dont believe her and i rly resent her. yet she loves me. its like wtf. i dont fuckin know anymore. kill me now.@@4

column1: 629@@ I have been suicidal for almost 5 years now and it is due to hair loss.  Having a full head of hair is absolutely integral to my ability to feel handsome and comfortable in my own skin
column2: and to my enjoyment of life.  I noticed my hair loss very late so no amount of preventative medication or any other type of current treatment can really help me out at this point.  Not to mention
column3: I was on anti-depressants for a number of years
column4: which I believe triggered the premature onset of my hair loss
column5: a fact that I didn't even know until it was too late.  I have also experienced terrible side effects from finasteride
column6: which is the most common medication to prevent hair loss today.  And I am not about to wear a wig.  Life is just not worth living anymore and I always wish I would just fall asleep and never wake up.  I cry out to God to relieve my pain and He does absolutely nothing.  I don't know where else to turn or what else to do.  Life is just hopeless.@@3

637@@ To me the thought of suicide
column2: while very disturbing to most people
column3: is very much a source of comfort during my tough
column4: depressive times. I'll explain why- Sometimes situations get so tough to deal with when you have severe depression. Your emotions and pain can become so extreme
column5: that no Earthly solution seems to be strong or effective enough to stop the pain. Pretty much every time I find myself getting to this point
column6: the thought of suicide seems to be the only possible solution that would 100% get rid of my pain. Just the thought that there is actually a fool-proof
column7: sure-fire solution to end the depression and pain makes things better for me. This does not mean that I'm going to do it. But sometimes when I'm to my lowest points
column8: I like to lay down
column9: shut my eyes
column10: and imagine that I don't exist
column11: that I'm free of all the pain. It is a very comforting thought for me. I know it seems strange to some
column12: but I'm a believer that we are all individually different and think/see things differently. Suicide is basically the solution to my pain and tough times that I envision when I can't possibly think of a single other solution that would help at all (which often times is the case). The thing about it is though
column13: I believe all or most of us who suffer from severe depression view the thought of suicide as comforting. After all
column14: most of us eventually wind up at that conclusion. That's the whole reason why
column15: when we are to our lowest point
column16: we reach for the solution we think will end the pain
column17: which is often suicide. We arrive at the thought of suicide because it is a source of comfort to our minds. We are looking for solutions to our pain
column18: and the concept of suicide offers them. I'm not endorsing suicide. I'm merely explaining how my mind thinks about it
column19: and why I believe suicide is often the thought/action of severely depressed people.@@5

My daughter has to go to get her shots at the doctor office tomorrow and I have no way to get her their. the streets here have no sidewalks and it's a 10 block walk to the nearest bus stop and we would have to walk in the streets is is so dangerous with no sidewalks and 45 mph speed limit on the streets in back of where I stay. I'm just fed up of having to live like this. Why doesn't God ever bless me with anything nice. All I ever get in life is living with no money
column2: mental and physical ailments
column3: and abusive people that abuse me emotionally and physically. They have taken everything I ever had in life. I don't even know why I am typing this. Also my appetite is poor a lot of the times especially with my depression and this painful ear infection but sometimes I get the mood and desire to eat but I have no way to go buy any food. My food stamps came but I haven't been able to go to the grocery store due to lack of transportation and no one will help me. I haven't went to the bathroom since last week probably since last Friday... I don't want to go to food boxes at church because we went to one and the food was expired and did not tastes good. I'm so sorry i don't mean to complain but is there something wrong with wanting to be able to eat fresh non expired food that tastes good like a lot of people get to do? I don't even know if anyone will read this or not and I don't even know what I am trying to ask on here because I don't think there is anything or anyone that can help me at this point in my life. My life might as well be over now. I want to commit suicide so bad right now I just think I am too cowardly to go through with it I'll probably just make a half failed attempt at it.@@4
